alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 26 at 3:33AM EST until November 29 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 6 inches possible in the most persistent lake effect snow. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Cuyahoga county. * WHEN...From Monday evening through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes on Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Any snow accumulations through the day Monday will be minimal. Snow is expected to push south into area Monday night into Tuesday morning, with rates in excess of 1 inch per hour possible in snow bands. The greatest accumulations are expected across eastern portions of the county.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
